Thank you Silvergate Inn, House Sovyn, and Ord an Dragan!

1
Maylan
Wednesday, November 1st, 2017, 11:58:30 AM

I want to give a big kudos and thank you to Silvergate Inn, House Sovyn, and the MHO Ord an Dragan for making the Eve of the Reunion Tour extra special. It's a big ask to have folks participate in a player-run event during the final hours of EG, and your officers really helped make the event more enjoyable for the rabble rousers. Next year I'll think up more ways to trash your party tents, cause debauchery, and generally run amok!

~Land Pirate Maylan~
